description: Number of ways to partition a labeled set into 2-colored subsets of equal size.
maple: with(numtheory): for n from 1 to 50 do d := divisors(n): s := 0: for k from 1 to nops(d) do s := s +(2*n!)/(d[k]!*((n/d[k])!)^d[k]) od: printf(`%d,`,s) od:
author: _Christian G. Bower_
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Feb 19 2001
